channel.title: Port
channel.description: need help with setting up port Have teamview

item.title: Port
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Zymus, post:4, topic:550997”][quote author=starbeast199 link=topic=669913.msg4479590#msg4479590 date=1428687145]
i have followed the guide but i am still alittle confuse on what to put into my Internal IP address
and the internal port

[/quote]

Open your command prompt

type in ipconfig /all

Look for your IPv4 Address, that’s your internal address.

Internal port should just be your server port (43594).[/quote]

Yeah. If both are the same, then only that one will be open. If you do start: 43594 end:50000, then 43595, 43596, 43597, …49999, 50000 will be open.

Read full topic

item.title: Port
item.dc:creator: @starbeast199 starbeast199
item.description:
@starbeast199 wrote:

both the ending and the beginning?

item.title: Port
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“starbeast199, post:3, topic:550997”]i have followed the guide but i am still alittle confuse on what to put into my Internal IP address
and the internal port[/quote]

Open your command prompt

type in ipconfig /all

Look for your IPv4 Address, that’s your internal address.

Internal port should just be your server port (43594).

Read full topic
